name: Titanium.App.iOS.UserNotificationCenter
summary: The top-level App iOS Notification Center module. It is used to control scheduled notifications and receive details about the system-wide notification settings.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: The function that is being called after the notifications have been fetched.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: The function that is being called after the notifications have been fetched.

methods.name: removeDeliveredNotifications
methods.summary: Removes the specified delivered notifications from the notification-center. If no notifications are specified, all delivered notifications will be removed.
methods.description: Delivered notifications can be obtained via a call to the getDeliveredNotifications method.

parameters.name: notifications
parameters.summary: The delivered notification to remove. If none specified, all pending notifications will be removed.

methods.name: removePendingNotifications
methods.summary: Removes the specified pending notifications to prevent them from being triggered. If no notifications are specified, all pending notifications will be removed.
methods.description: Pending notifications can be obtained via a call to the getPendingNotifications method.

parameters.name: notifications
parameters.summary: The pending notification to remove. If none specified, all pending notifications will be removed.

methods.name: requestUserNotificationSettings
methods.summary: Notification types and user notification categories the application is registered to use.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: The callback invoked when requesting user notification settings.
